meanings.sent1: She symmetrizes her drawings by adding equal shapes on both sides.
meanings.sent2: The artist symmetrizes the design to create a balanced composition.
meanings.sent3: The cat symmetrizes itself on the windowsill, looking perfectly mirrored.
meanings.sent4: His actions symmetrize the chaos around him, bringing order to the situation.
meanings.sent5: The dance troupe symmetrizes their movements, creating a visually stunning performance.

meanings.definition: To bring into balance or harmony.
meanings.sent1: The therapist symmetrizes the conflicting emotions of her patients to help them find peace.
meanings.sent2: He symmetrizes his work and personal life to reduce stress and improve well-being.
meanings.sent3: The chef symmetrizes the flavors in the dish, creating a perfect blend of tastes.
meanings.sent4: Her words symmetrize the team, fostering unity and cooperation among members.
meanings.sent5: The conductor symmetrizes the orchestra, ensuring a harmonious and synchronized performance.
